{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DHP-W306AV |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00452V666 |price= |est_release_date=09/23/2010 |fcc_date=06/09/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_id=KA2HPW306AVA1 |ic_id=4216A-HPW306AVA1 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Intellon |cpu2_model=INT6400A1G |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2=4 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=ProMOS |ram2_model=V54C3128164VBI6 |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Powerline AV Wireless N Extender''' :[http://www.dlink.com/DHP-W306AV Product page]
There is an [[Intellon]] INT6400A1G on-board the ''HomePlug'' board.
===Marked boards=== *"21512D1220A17A1" and "REV.A0-2" is silkscreened on the HomePlug board. :"21514D1220A11A1 REV.A0-2" appears to be silkscreened on the power board. :"21514D1220A15A1", "Rev.A0-2", "DIG-1220A1", and "2012/02/23" is silkscreened on the Wi-Fi board.
